alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 01 at 3:38AM CDT until September 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR HARLAN AND FURNAS COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA AS WELL AS PHILLIPS, ROOKS, SMITH, AND OSBORNE COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly. Use caution if engaging in activities that may result in a fire starting.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
